snippet: A Czech appeals court has upheld the acquittal of the lead singer of the metal band Lamb of God, who had been charged in a fan’s death at a Prague concert in 2010.
abstract: Czech appeals court upholds acquittal of Randy Blythe, lead singer of metal band Lamb of God, who had been charged in fan's death at Prague concert in 2010.
lead_paragraph: A Czech appeals court has upheld the acquittal of the lead singer of the metal band Lamb of God, who had been charged in a fan’s death at a Prague concert in 2010.

headline.main: Czech Appeals Court Upholds Acquittal of Lamb of God Singer
headline.print_headline: Czech Appeals Court Upholds Acquittal of Lamb of God Singer
